CustomField.formula: CASE(StageName, "(1) Qualification",1, "(1) Onboarding",1, "(2) Discovery",2, "(2) Nurture",2, "(3) POC Scoping",3, "(3) Proposal",3, "(4) Proof of Concept",4, "(5) Validating Business Case/Negotiating",5, "(6) Signature",6, "Closed Won",100, "Closed Lost",97, "Churn",99, NULL )
CustomField.label: Stage Number
